name: Beam Stream
description:
You need to guide the light beam through the obstacles by placing the reflectors provided. The further you go the higher the score. All assets are custom created including sprites and sound effects.  Made in Unity3D for Brackey's Game Jam 2018.

Game is supported on: Windows(x86_64),  Android Jellybean 4.1+

Team members: 

Sound: Dennchen Lama

Artist: Monideep Chakraborty

Programmer: Debayudh Rarhi.
